Question.Subject: Is there any way to get back a follower request you denied on Twitter??? I NEED HELP ASAP I PROMISE 10 POINTS!?
Question.Content: Well yesterday a celebrity requested to follow me. I protect my tweets. So...when I went to my follower request I accidently hit deny :( Please please please please please please please help me. I replied to the email that had the follower request on it asking Twitter if they could see the request again but I really doubt they are going to answer. PLEASE HELP ME ANY ONE. Thank you so so so much.
Question.ChosenAnswer: Nope now take a deep breath turn off your computer leave the cell phone home and spend the rest of the day outside

Answer.Content: No! Pay better attention next time, being fast at everything is not THAT important!
Nope now take a deep breath turn off your computer leave the cell phone home and spend the rest of the day outside
